name: Anti-Venom, Horrifying Healer
oracle_text:
When Anti-Venom enters, if he was cast, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
If damage would be dealt to Anti-Venom, prevent that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on him.
flavor_text: "You are a sickness on this city. I am the cure!"

name: Arachne, Psionic Weaver
oracle_text:
Web-slinging {W} (You may cast this spell for {W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.)
As Arachne enters, look at an opponent's hand, then choose a card type other than creature.
Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

name: Aunt May
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. If it's a Spider, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "I cooked your favorite breakfast, Petey—wheatcakes!"

name: City Pigeon
oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
flavor_text:
"Aw, that was my lunch!"
—Spider-Man, Peter Parker

name: Costume Closet
oracle_text:
This artifact enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from this artifact onto target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever a modified creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

oracle_text:
When this creature enters, choose one —

Flash

flavor_text:

oracle_text:
Enchant land
When this Aura enters, create three 1/1 green and white Human Citizen creature tokens.
Enchanted land has "{1}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery."

name: Origin of Spider-Man
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach.
II — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It becomes a legendary Spider Hero in addition to its other types.
III — Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

all_parts.name: Peter Parker // Amazing Spider-Man
all_parts.type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Scientist Hero // Legendary Creature — Spider Human Hero

name: Rent Is Due
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may tap two untapped creatures and/or Treasures you control. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, sacrifice this enchantment.
flavor_text: "You're a month late again, Parker! Give me my money or you're out on the street!"

name: Selfless Police Captain
oracle_text:
This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, put its +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text:
"Peter always disappears when Spider-Man is around. How very odd."
—Captain George Stacy

name: Silver Sable, Mercenary Leader

When Silver Sable enters, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.
Whenever Silver Sable attacks, target modified creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

name: Spectacular Spider-Man
oracle_text:
Flash
{1}: Spectacular Spider-Man gains flying until end of turn.
{1}, Sacrifice Spectacular Spider-Man: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Spectacular Tactics
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

"Not bad, kid, but you've got a lot to learn."
—Spider-Woman, Jessica Drew

name: Spider-Man, Web-Slinger
oracle_text: Web-slinging {W} (You may cast this spell for {W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.)
flavor_text: "Nothing like a little crimefighting before class."

name: Spider-UK
oracle_text:
Web-slinging {2}{W} (You may cast this spell for {2}{W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.)
At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures entered the battlefield under your control this turn, you draw a card and gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Spiders across the Multiverse are dying. I must keep them safe."

name: Starling, Aerial Ally
oracle_text:
Flying
When Starling enters, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Aaaah! Is this what it's like for people I swing around? I'm gonna throw up!"
—Spider-Man, Miles Morales

name: Sudden Strike
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Sometimes, one decisive blow is all it takes to turn a fight around.

name: Thwip!
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. If it's a Spider, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Yes! This is what being Spider-Man is all about! Swinging through the sky—a New York sky—patrolling the city. Every moment a chance to make a difference. To fight the good fight."

name: Web Up
oracle_text: When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Courtesy of your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man."

name: Web-Shooters
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has reach and "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls."
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "A spider needs a web! This little device should just do the trick. I'll fasten one to each arm—it'll operate by the slightest pressure of any finger."

name: Wild Pack Squad
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gains first strike and vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: Silver Sable doesn't accept second best.

Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

oracle_text:
Choose one or both —

Flying
{1}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

oracle_text:
As long as there are eight or more cards in your graveyard, Doc Ock has base power and toughness 8/8.
As long as you control another Villain, Doc Ock has hexproof. (He can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Flash

name: Spider-Punk

Riot (This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Other Spiders you control have riot.
Spells and abilities can't be countered.
Damage can't be prevented.
flavor_text: "Disrespect authority. Smash the system."

name: Spider-Verse
oracle_text:
The "legend rule" doesn't apply to Spiders you control.
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste. Do this only once each turn.
flavor_text: Every Spider ever...and then some!

name: Spinneret and Spiderling
oracle_text:
Whenever you attack with two or more Spiders, put a +1/+1 counter on Spinneret and Spiderling.
Whenever Spinneret and Spiderling deals 4 or more damage, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

name: Stegron the Dinosaur Man
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Dinosaur Formula — {1}{R}, Discard this card: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+1 and becomes a Dinosaur in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: "It isss my intention to return the dinosaur to hisss rightful place as master of thisss earth."

name: Superior Foes of Spider-Man
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, you may exile the top card of your library. If you do, you may play that card until you exile another card with this creature.
flavor_text: Boomerang managed to assemble a squad that really wasn't all that sinister and certainly wasn't all that six.

name: Taxi Driver
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I got two speeds, buddy: fast and off duty."

name: Wisecrack
oracle_text: Target creature deals damage equal to its power to itself. If that creature is attacking, Wisecrack deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: "I support your right to bear arms, Grizzly, but this is getting ridiculous."

name: Damage Control Crew
oracle_text:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Repair — Return target card with mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard to your hand.
• Impound — Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "We got two hours until Spidey's webbing dissolves. I need engineers on-site now."

name: Ezekiel Sims, Spider-Totem
oracle_text:
Reach
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Spider you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: For all his wealth and power, there is a fear deep inside Ezekiel that spurs him to train others.

name: Grow Extra Arms
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a Spider.
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Trample

This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{4}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

name: Urban Retreat
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

name: Vibrant Cityscape
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: If you can make it here, you can make it anywhere.
